constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

decision_conditions: Inadequate and insufficient details for the proposed materials has been submitted to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012

Insufficient information has been provided in relation to the proposed detailed drainage design, as such it has not been demonstrated that the development would prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site, contrary to policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Details required for conditions 4 (samples of materials), 5 (construction management plan), 12 (detailed drainage design), 15 (arboricultural method statement), 20 (landscaping scheme and management plan), 21 (nature enhancements), and 22 (urban greening factor assessment) of planning permission 22/01233/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of 6 x terrace houses with associated parking, amenity space, individual sheds, cycle stores and refuse/recycling facilities.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
